OrgName.entry: SHEFFIELD YOGA CENTRE - VENUES FOR HIRE

Desc.entry: Two large rooms for hire. One has wooden floors, high windows and ceilings which create good light and space. Suitable for Pilates, dance, movement, singing and drama classes. Also has a library room with sofas which is more suited to discussion and reading groups. Kitchen and toilet facilities. The rooms are offered for one-off workshops and regular classes.
